job.title: Machine Learning/ Data Science/ Data Engineer
job.description: ** Multiple Roles - Immediate Interview & Start **W2 (Preferred). HOSPITALITY INDUSTRY CLIENT (FORTUNE COMPANY)Role:           Machine Learning/ Data Science/ Data EngineerLocation:    San Francisco Bay Area (Remote work until pandemic)Duration:    Long Term ContractJob Description:● 5+ years of industry experience or a PhD + 2 years industry experience in appliedmachine learning.● Strong coding skills in Python/Java/Scala or equivalent● Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow andpopular ML frameworks like Tensorflow or Pytorch is preferred● Solid understanding of engineering best practices and complexities of models inproduction● Experience developing and productionizing machine learning models is a plus● Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Spark is a plus● Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow is a plus● Industry experience building end-to-end Machine Learning Infrastructure a bigplusIf you are interested to pursue this opportunity, please send your updated resume to Sam@agiledatapro.com
